{"id":926876979,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 1 week","timestamp":1680475329,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/926876979/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make The String Great","memory":"6.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool sameLetterDiffCase(char a,char b){\n        if(a==b)\n        return(false);\n        if(islower(a))\n        return(a==tolower(b));\n        return(a==toupper(b));\n    }\n    string makeGood(string s) {\n        stack<char> stk;\n        for(char c:s){\n                if(stk.empty() || !sameLetterDiffCase(stk.top(),c))\n                stk.push(c);\n                else\n                stk.pop();\n            }\n        string str=\"\";\n        while(!stk.empty()){\n            str+=stk.top();\n            stk.pop();\n        }\n        reverse(str.begin(),str.end());\n        return(str);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-the-string-great","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
